name: Halloween Experience 3: GGen
description:
Halloween Experience 3: GGen it's a short spooky/terror game for free.

  • 🎃Short game, average of 30 minutes of gameplay
  • 🎃Spooky/terror game, ready for Halloween!
  • 🎃Low Poly and First Person
  • 🎃Languages: English, Spanish and Catalan
  • 🎃Original Music
The development

For the third year in a row, here's another short game for Halloween! And for the first time... it's also available in Catalan!

This time took me a couple of months working on it in my free time, and like the other ones. is made with Unity. I did the programming and music, the graphics are assets from different sources bought on bundles and unity asset store.

Thanks for playing! :)

As usual, comments and ratings are very appreciated! Also, after you play this game, if you had a good time... consider making a donation to buy me a coffe! :)

Happy Halloween!🎃
